rulings.text: If you control no creatures other than Joo Dee and no artifacts as the ability resolves, you'll need to sacrifice either Joo Dee or the token copy.
The sacrifice part of Joo Dee's ability happens as part of the resolution of the ability. Players cannot do anything between creating the copy and sacrificing an artifact or creature.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.

rulings.text: If you choose the first mode and the creature gains a counter in response, you can't remove counters from it instead; the spell just doesn't resolve. Similarly, if you choose the second mode and the creature loses its counters in response, you can't destroy it instead.
If you choose the second mode for Heartless Act, you choose which counters to remove from the creature, no matter who controls the creature. You may choose counters of different kinds.

Wenn diese Verzauberung ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen 2/2 roten Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein mit Feuerbändigen 1. (Immer wenn er angreift, erzeuge {R}. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verlierst du dieses Mana nicht.)
Immer wenn du während des Zuges eines Gegners einen Zauberspruch wirkst, erzeuge einen 2/2 roten Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein mit Feuerbändigen 1.

foreignData.name: 火の国の占領
foreignData.text:
このエンチャントが戦場に出たとき、火の技１を持つ赤の２/２の兵士・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。（それが攻撃するたび、{R}を加える。このマナは戦闘終了時まで残る。）
対戦相手のターン中にあなたが呪文１つを唱えるたび、火の技１を持つ赤の２/２の兵士・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

mainBoard.name: Fire Nation Occupation
mainBoard.text:
When this enchantment enters, create a 2/2 red Soldier creature token with firebending 1. (Whenever it attacks, add {R}. This mana lasts until end of combat.)
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, create a 2/2 red Soldier creature token with firebending 1.

mainBoard.flavorText: Mai didn't always care, but she never missed.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai se montrait souvent indifférente, mais ne ratait jamais sa cible.
foreignData.name: Précision mortelle
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, payez {4} ou sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature.
Détruisez une créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai war es nicht immer wichtig, aber sie traf immer.
foreignData.name: Tödliche Präzision
foreignData.text:
Bezahle {4} oder opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai mostrava interesse di rado, ma non mancava mai il bersaglio.
foreignData.name: Precisione Letale
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: マイはいつだって気のない素振りだが、狙いを外したことは一度もない。
foreignData.name: 正確無比
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、{4}を支払うか、アーティファクトやクリーチャーである１つを生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Mai no siempre prestaba atención, pero nunca fallaba.
foreignData.name: Precisión mortal
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefacto o criatura.
Destruye la criatura objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Deadly Precision
mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"In the Swamp, we see visions of people we've lost, people we've loved, folks we think are gone."
—Нuu

foreignData.flavorText:
« Dans le Marais, nous recevons des visions de ceux que nous avons perdus, de ceux que nous avons aimés, de ceux que nous croyons partis. »
-Huu
foreignData.name: Lande prospère
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le noir.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Im Sumpf sehen wir Erscheinungen von Verstorbenen, geliebten Personen, jenen, die wir für immer verloren glaubten."
-Huu
foreignData.name: Gedeihendes Moor
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Schwarz.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Nella palude riceviamo visioni di persone che abbiamo perso, persone che abbiamo amato e persone che crediamo non ci siano più."
-Huu
foreignData.name: Landa Florida
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal nero.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText:
「この沼地では失ってしまった人や愛した人たちの幻が見える。もう会えないと思っている人たちだ。」
――ヒュー
foreignData.name: 興隆する湿地帯
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、黒でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{B}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"En el pantano, vemos visiones de personas que hemos perdido, a las que hemos querido, personas que creemos desaparecidas".
-Huu
foreignData.name: Páramo floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea negro.
{T}: Agrega {B} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
